name: Tab Limiter
description: Blocks tabs from opening after a set limit of 10.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src *; img-src * data: blob: filesystem: chrome-extension:;
content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self';
